body:
Learn how to access the HackerRank Academy with on-demand learning paths and courses to assist you and your hiring teams learn about the functionality available in the HackerRank for Work Platform.

What is the HackerRank Academy?

The HackerRank Academy is a learning opportunity for organizations working with the HackerRank Platform. The academy is a resource for new and existing users to learn how to navigate and utilize the HackerRank Platform, along with best practices and guidance to other helpful HackerRank resources. The learning paths and courses available within the academy are segmented into bite-sized pieces, where users can return and pick up wherever they left off. Learn how to get up and running with HackerRank and spend less time reviewing resumes and more time interviewing high-quality candidates.

How can the HackerRank Academy be accessed?

  1. Through the HackerRank Academy URL, you'll be asked to provide your name and work email address.
  2. Through the HackerRank Platform (instructions below)
    • Log in to the HackerRank for Work Platform.
    • Click on the Academy Link at the bottom of the screen. (As highlighted in the image below)
    • Enjoy the available courses and learning paths!
title: Accessing the HackerRank Academy
